text:
So, Smart Custom Modules, is this ever happening? :slightly_smiling_face: I see that other people have brought it up in the past, and <@U22PJPGK0> said it's on the roadmap, but no updates yet: <https://integrate.HubSpot.com/t/smart-custom-module/1466/3>

The ability to personalize not just text and forms but entire content areas on the page (while maintaining ease of editing for our marketing colleagues) would bring HubSpots personalization features to a whole new level. As an agency, it would also make it a lot easier for us to convince our customers to pay for the $300 Website Addon and move their websites out of free/cheap alternatives such as Wordpress etc.
That's code for "Go to developer day"
for those teams abroad difficult and expensive to go to inbound for Developers Day, what about online access to sessions by streaming? We would gladly pay for it!
